header: The Picture-Story of the Lost Sheep

verse: All the tax-gatherers and sinners were coming to hear Jesus.
The proud religious law-keepers and the teachers of the Law began to speak against Him. They said, “This man receives sinners and eats with them.”
Then Jesus told them a picture-story, saying,

header: The Picture-Story of the Lost Piece of Money
The Picture-Story of the Foolish Son Who Spent All His Money

verse: And Jesus said, “There was a man who had two sons.
